# epub2md

Convert EPUB to clean Markdown chapters.

## Install

```bash
pip install epub2md
```

## Usage

```bash
epub2md book.epub
epub2md book.epub my-chapters
```

Output:
- `chapters/` - Markdown files
- `chapters-media/` - Images

## Requirements

- Python 3.8+
- [pandoc](https://pandoc.org/installing.html)
